intro.dialog: My little sisters were wondering...|L|Can you come play in our dungeon?
We are going to play |C3|Kiwi's Dungeon of Demise and Doom.

intro_twins.dialog: My little sisters wanted to ask...|L|You both wanna play in our dungeon?
We wanna play |C3|Kiwi's Dungeon of Demise and Doom|C0| with you.

talk_blank.dialog: Is that supposed to be   me?
|C3|(I'm trying so hard not to cry.)
You are going to be the |C3|Artist|C0| class, okee?
Artists start with |C3|a lot of Health|C0| Points.
Oh, did that make you sad?
Oh, sorry.|L||!|Sometimes grown ups just cry a lot when they are really happy.
My little sisters drawed some of them too.
They are saying you should be the crying class instead.
Well, I AM     very good at it!
But today you will be the |C3|Artist|C0| class, okee?
No more tears.|!||L|I'm ready to play now.

talk_defect.dialog: Okee, so like, you are going to be the |C3|Sorcerer|C0| class.
And then you beat up the bad girls.
Sorcerers can also |C3|heal after every battle.|C0|
A sorcerer uses magic spells to fight by pondering her magic orb.
A more round and smooth orb is more powerful!
Well, there is no better orb for the job then.
I assure you, my radius is identical all the way around.
Darling, you should know by now that it is an irrational number.
Because nothing rational could possibly explain this amount of perfection.
I dunno what a fashionable number is.
Wait, did you say I have to fight something?
Ya, but it's just for pretend.
No violence in front of the child.

talk_twins.dialog: How do we play?
Okee, you are going to be the |C3|Knight|C0| class.
You will be one of the Sunlight Knights.
That sounds fun!
What's a knight though?
So like, a knight has a sword or a cutter to fight, and they start with |C3|2 defense|C0| points.
They go save princesses when they are in trouble.
And then they get to |wave|kiss da princesses!
Oh!
Is that so?
|wave|Hahahahaha!
Kiwi, you are all our new little sisters now.
|wave|Ok, Big Sister.
You get to be the |C3|Jester|C0| class.
Jesters wear funny hats.
I always wanted to wear a hat!
Also, you can heal knights with your funny jokes that also |C3|hurt the bad girls.
Her jokes should also hurt me too.
You love my jokes.
My little sisters are saying that our new big sisters are funny.

talk_devil.dialog: Now this     is an evil lair!
Is that what I think it is?
That's me with a Limited Edition Malevolent Gates Signature Guitar.
Kiwi,    how do you even know what this is?
You shared your brain to us, you 'member?
We know all your favorite stuff now.
Oh yeah, that did happen, huh?
You are gunna be the |C3|Metalhead|C0| class.
Metalheads can |C3|attack everyone at the same time|C0| without a power up.
I'm ready for a classic game of Dungeon of Demise and Doom.

to_first_round.dialog: The story begins when |C3|[VAL1]|C0| and |C3|[VAL2]|C0| find a spooky dungeon.
Then, they hear a scream.|L||!||shake|"Help me! I'm trapped in the dungeon!"
It was |C3|The Princess,|C0| and you have to save her!
So they go into the dungeon, and then-

to_next_round.dialog_rand1: Then you go down a long hallway.
to_next_round.dialog_rand2: You check the door on da left, but it's locked!|L||!|So you go right instead.
to_next_round.dialog_rand3: You go into the hole in the wall where they came from.
to_next_round.dialog_rand4: |C3|[VAL2]|C0| shares a snack she brought, and then you go into the next room.
to_next_round.dialog_rand5: You hear a strange noise in the next room, so you go check it out.
to_next_round.dialog_rand6: The only way to go is a trap door on da floor.|!| So you jump in.
to_next_round.dialog_rand7: You find a ladder that goes up to another room.|!| So you climb up.
to_next_round.dialog_rand8: It looks like there is nowhere else ta go.|!| Then you accidentally press a button that opens the door!
to_next_round.dialog_rand9: It's getting darker, but |C3|[VAL2]|C0| finds a torch to light the way.

to_next_round.dialog_rand1: You see a shiny object in the corner, but suddenly-
to_next_round.dialog_rand2: You hear noises that get closer, and then-
to_next_round.dialog_rand3: |C3|[VAL1]|C0| doesn't see anything, but |C3|[VAL2]|C0| tells her to turn around, and then-
to_next_round.dialog_rand4: The room is very dark, but you see something coming out from da dark.
to_next_round.dialog_rand5: You go into the next room, but something is waiting here for you.
to_next_round.dialog_rand6: There is something shiny on a table, but before you can get it-
to_next_round.dialog_rand8: You feel like something was following you, so you turn around.
to_next_round.dialog_rand9: The next room is empty, so you let your guard down.|!| Then suddenly-

battle_mix1: You are attacked by a buncha bad girls!
battle_mix2: Bad girls jump out and attack!
battle_stones: You run into some angry heart stones!
battle_dancers: You are attacked by some dangerous dancers!
battle_nuggets: A swarm of Zombie Nuggets attack!
battle_slimes: You are surrounded by a buncha slimes!

start_battle_zombie.dialog: They run into a |C3|Mob Zombie|C0| with her mob of |C3|Zombie Nuggets!|C0|
Watch out! |C3|Zombie Nuggets|C0| are weak, but they let the next enemy have a turn too!

start_battle_ooze.dialog: "All da cuties who stand before |C3|Madam Ooze|C0| will never want to leave us!"
Watch out! |C3|Paint Slimes|C0| are weak, but they let the next enemy have a turn too!

start_battle_dancer.dialog: You are distracted by a |C3|Cosmic Dancer|C0| and her |wave|sparkly dance moves.
Her |C3|Murder Blossoms|C0| wanna dance battle to the death!

start_battle_shepherd.dialog: |shake|"Dang it! I will freakin burn you to death with my heckin fire powers!"
The |C3|Shepherd of Fire|C0| is here to fight you!

start_battle_vampire.dialog: She likes to take your HP by giving you kisses.

start_battle_spirit.dialog: "Who is making all this noise in da dungeon? I will have revenge for this!"
It was a |C3|Spirit of Vengeance!|C0||L||!|She is very scary.

comment_turn_support.dialog: |C3|[VAL2]|C0| can heal |C3|[VAL1]|C0| or make her even stronger.

comment_turn_target.dialog: Now you choose something to hit!

you_win.dialog_rand2: And then you found some treasure!
you_win.dialog_rand3: You see some shiny stuff on the floor.
you_win.dialog_rand4: The bad girls dropped some stuff.
you_win.dialog_rand5: Then you walk into the next room and find a box of loot!
you_win.dialog_rand6: Then you find some loot around in the next room.
you_win.dialog_rand7: And also, there was a treasure box in here!
you_win.dialog_rand8: The bad girls were guarding da treasure box.

you_win_but_times_up.dialog: And so the heroes made it this far into the dungeon.
But what traps and tricks wait for them up ahead?
Find out next time     in     |shake||C3|Kiwi's Dungeon of Demise and Doom!

you_lose.dialog: Don't worry, you ran away in time.
|C3|[VAL1]|C0| and |C3|[VAL2]|C0| went back to town for the night.
They were feeling better after a good night sleep.
They went back to the dungeon in da morning!
They made their way back to the same spot, but then-

you_timed_out.dialog: |C3|[VAL2]|C0| remembered that it was bed time and they had to get out of there!

comment_choose_rewards.dialog: |C3|Choose [VAL1] cards|C0| you want to keep.|L|The rest go in da |wave|trash pile.

times_up.dialog: Okee, the game is over for today!

times_up_defect.dialog: Okee, we will continue from here next time!
It's just for pretend, my Defect.
Sorry, I got carried away there.
|wave|That just means you really like our game.

to_gift.dialog: It's time for da real prizes!

to_another_gift.dialog: That one is from my little sister.

to_last_gift.dialog: You can have ONE more, okee?

sleep_response.dialog: Well okee, but you still have to come in.
And we get to curl up next to you.

leave_blank.dialog: |wave|I love you!|norm||L||!|Hey, can we call you Big Sister?
Kiwi,     I'm going to cry again!

leave_defect.dialog: Wow, your claws are so long!
You can't hide secrets from us!

leave_twins.dialog: Don't worry. We can save the princess next time!
You will get that kiss eventually, Big Sister!
Why are all my sisters like this?

leave_devil.dialog: You saw that part where I was all-
|wave||C3|Weedly weedly weedly|L|Needle leedle needle leedle|L|Wah wah WAHHHHHHHHH!
Oh yeah? I just wrote it. No big deal.
